plot: Four slackers, one filthy flat, 30 academic years at University, 25 degrees, no ambition... they think it's great living in a world where C's get Degrees... but they are due for a wake-up call.
plot_en: Four slackers, one filthy flat, 30 academic years at University, 25 degrees, no ambition... they think it's great living in a world where C's get Degrees... but they are due for a wake-up call.
plot_es: Four slackers, one filthy flat, 30 academic years at University, 25 degrees, no ambition... they think it's great living in a world where C's get Degrees... but they are due for a wake-up call.
title: C's Get Degrees
